assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All contributing authors are members of the LEGASCREEN consortium. The aim of this consortium is to develop of an early screening test for dyslexia based on biological markers. AW, JB, FE and HK hold a patent concerning the genetic diagnosis of dyslexia.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
